column2:
*This event is exclusive for GUC students/alumni/MBA only!

The GUC Annual Internship & Employment Fair will be taking place on Saturday April 21st & Sunday April 22nd 2018 at the GUC Campus – Convention Complex, this year the fair will host more than 100 exhibitor representing different sectors & industries. The internship & employment fair is organized by the SCAD – Student Career & Alumni Development office at the GUC.

Location: 

GUC Annual Internship & Employment Fair’18 will take place in the GUC Convention Complex (Examination Halls) at the south end of the GUC campus. For facilitation of students’ transportation on campus, there will be shuttle buses moving to the fair venue. GUC graduates attending the fair will have the chance to access the campus from gate 8 (tbc) and park in the available alumni parking spots.

Date & Time: 

Saturday, April 21st 2018 from 11:00 am to 12:45 pm & from 02:30 pm to 05:00 pm (timing tbc)
Sunday, April 22nd 2018 from 09:30 am to 12:45 pm & from 02:30 pm to 05:00 pm  (timing tbc)

GUC Startup Career Fair

About the event:
The startup career fair is a recruitment event that aims at connecting startups and young entrepreneurial firms with GUC students and graduates. Participating startups will be offering a wide range of opportunities for GUC students such as (internships, freelancing, part time jobs, temporary jobs, summer jobs, etc.), in addition to full time opportunities for GUC graduates.
The Startup Career Fair is considered the first of its type in Egypt and the region; and is part of the GUC continuous efforts to serve the national economy and employment scene. The fair is organized by the GUC Student Career & Alumni Development – SCAD – Office, and sponsored by ariika, Benchmark Consultancy Egypt, Hitchhicker, Plantform, and Robusta, in addition to the participation of more than 35 startups.

Stay tuned for list of participants!

Date & Time:
Event entrance is exclusive for GUC students & graduates! 
Location: GUC Campus – Old Basketball Court
Date: Saturday 03/03/2018
Time: From 09:30 am till 03:30 pm
Graduates entrance gate: to be announced later

For more information:
Students & Graduates inquiries: scad@guc.edu.eg
Startups inquiries: corporates.scad@guc.edu.eg

#WHY_STARTUPS #SCAD_OFFICE #GUC_STARTUP_CAREER_FAIR

FAST & PRAY FOR EGYPT
صوم و صلاة من أجل مصر
دعوة لكل المصريين من كل الأديان للصوم و الصلاة من أجل مصر
لأن جميعنا يؤمن بأن الله وحده كلى الحكمة و الرحمة هو القادر على حل أى صراع أو مشاكل.
It is an open invitation for all EGYPTIANS from all Religions 
to pray and fast from Tuesday 11 till Thursday 13,October 2011. For EGYPT
As we all believe that ONLY GOD with all wisdom and mercy can solve all conflicts and problems.

“God, bring change, justice and peace to Egypt. Poverty and oppression is never your will. Things do need to change in Egypt. But let your hand Bring calm and patience and order and wisdom in the process. Resist those who would abuse this disorder and use it for their own ends. Focus the passions for change on mercy, boldness, courage, and calm resolve. Bring peace to Egypt. Preserve the lives of the innocent and the weak. Keep Egypt a safe haven in a world of terror. It will take a miracle, but you do miracles. AMEN…”
